title: The Unsinkable Molly Brown
creator_credit: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Lawrence Weingarten and Helen Deutsch
brief_description: Debbie Reynolds stars in her Oscar nominated performance as the eponymous Molly Brown. Destined for better things, Western orphan Molly leaves her mountain cabin and her uneducated and poor upbringing in search of a rich husband and a better life in Denver society. In a typical rags to riches fashion, Molly becomes the wealthiest woman in society. Based on the musical play with music and lyrics by Meredith Wilson. Screen play by Helen Deutsch. Cast includes Debbie Reynolds, Harve Presnell and Ed Begley.
